short_summary: Supply and delivery seven High Current Potentiostats.
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery seven High Current Potentiostats. The High Current Potentiostats are to perform electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.",
full_summary:
### High Current Potentiostats Request for Proposal

**Reference No.**: cb-266-49576012 (Amendment 5)
**Tender Title**: High Current Potentiostats

**Tender Details**:
* **Document Reference**: cb-266-49576012_5
* **Release Date**: October 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 18, 2023 (10:58 am EST)
* **Solicitation No.**: 23-58154
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified

**Delivery Information**:
* **Delivery Region**: Vancouver, British Columbia
* **Delivery Period**: On or before 21 weeks after contract award
* **Point of Contact**:
	+ File Number: 23-58154/A
	+ Contracting Authority: Paul Hewitt
	+ Phone: (343) 573-1068
	+ Email: [Paul.Hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Paul.Hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

**Procurement Information**:
* **Trade Agreements**: Offsets under Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **Security Requirement**: N/A (minimum security level required by company)

**Tender Description**:
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites bids for the supply and delivery of seven high current potentiostats. The potentiostats are to be used for electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.

Delivery of the potentiostats will be made to the NRC's Vancouver facility. The vendor will be required to deliver the potentiostats on or before 21 weeks after contract award.

**Tender Documents**:
Files are accessible on the Canada Buys website:
* [23-58154_rfp_potentiostats_amdt-001_0_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice..._233
